item.title: About
item.description: Additional features include: Switching between light mode and dark mode Support for multiple languages Reusable Bootstrap components through configurable shortcodes and partials Versioned documentation, including sidebar navigation and version switcher Responsive image handling for multiple screen sizes and resolutions
